name: As One
description: Both pokemon fight as one with everything they can.
effect: As Ice Rider Calyrex, this pokemon acts as if it has both the abilities Chilling Neigh and Unnerve. As Shadow Rider Calyrex, acts as if it has Grim Neigh instead. This Ability cannot be swapped, copied, replaced or nullified (ignores the effects of Skill Swap, Worry Seed, Gastro Acid, Trace etc.)
